RKernel 1.1.4
  • Reference

Resizeable Widgets

Source: R/widget-resizeable.R
ResizeableWidget.Rd

R6 classes of resizeable containers for arbitrary HTML code

Usage

ResizeableWidget(...)

VResizeableWidget(...)

HResizeableWidget(...)

Arguments

...

Any arguments, currently ignored

Details

Support for resizeable widgets, available from https://github.com/melff/resizeable-widget (and hopefully soon from PyPi.org)

Super classes

RKernel::HasTraits -> RKernel::Widget -> RKernel::DOMWidget -> RKernel::AnyWidget -> ResizeableWidget

Public fields

_anywidget_id

The AnyWidget id

_css

A Unicode trait with relevant CSS code

_esm

A Unicode trait with relevant Javascript code

width

(Current) width of the widget

height

(Current) height of the widget

direction

Which direction(s) should the widget be resizeable

value

(Current) HTML code content of the widget

debug

Whether to show a dashed frame and background color for debugging

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

ResizeableWidgetClass$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
